sqlMap.update:
update MOBILE set ID=#id#
, NAME=#name#
where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: select t.* from MOBILE t where ID=#id#
select t.* from MOBILE t where 1=1

select r.id, r.region_name from REGION_CFG r where r.id in (select s.region_cfg_id from business_REGION_CFG s where s.businessid in (select bu.business_id from USER_BUSINESS_CFG bu where bu.user_id = #userId#))
r.city_code = #cityCode#

SELECT * FROM( SELECT trunc(SUM(nvl(tp.tourists,0)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT'))) touristcount, '1' as type FROM REGION_SUMMARY_BYDAY tp WHERE tp.area_code not in (SELECT distinct pc.area_code FROM prefix_cfg pc WHERE pc.provinces='安徽')
and tp.region_id in ($regionIds$)
AND tp.city_code=#cityId#
AND TO_CHAR(stat_day,'YYYY-MM-DD')IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#date#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),(LEVEL-1)),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RQ FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=1) )
Union All
SELECT * FROM( SELECT trunc(SUM(nvl(tp.tourists,0)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT'))) touristcount, '2' as type FROM tourist_phones_byday_sum tp WHERE tp.area_code not in (SELECT distinct pc.area_code FROM prefix_cfg pc WHERE pc.provinces='安徽')
AND tp.city_code=#cityId#
AND TO_CHAR(stat_day,'YYYY-MM-DD')IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#date#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),(LEVEL-1)),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RQ FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=1) )
Union All
SELECT * FROM( SELECT trunc(SUM(nvl(tp.tourists,0)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT'))) touristcount, '3' as type FROM tourist_phones_byday_sum tp WHERE tp.area_code not in (SELECT distinct pc.area_code FROM prefix_cfg pc WHERE pc.provinces='安徽')
AND tp.city_code=#cityId#
AND TO_CHAR(stat_day,'YYYY-MM-DD')IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#year#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),(LEVEL-1)),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RQ FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=1) )

select * FROM (SELECT m.provinces, m.provinces_code, trunc(SUM(nvl(tourists,0)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT'))) touristcount FROM tourist_phones_byday_sum tp, (SELECT distinct pc.area_code, pc.provinces, pc.provinces_code FROM prefix_cfg pc WHERE pc.provinces != '安徽') m WHERE tp.area_code = m.area_code
AND tp.city_code =#cityId#
AND TO_CHAR(stat_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#date#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), (LEVEL - 1)), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RQ FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 1) GROUP BY m.provinces, m.provinces_code order by touristcount desc ) Union All select '境外' as provinces,0 as provinces_code, trunc(SUM(nvl(tourists,0)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT'))) touristcount from TOURIST_PHONES_BYDAY_SUM t where t.area_code =-104 and t.stat_day = to_date(#date#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND t.city_code = #cityId#

select trunc(sum(t.in_tourists)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT')) as in_tourists,t.type from REGION_REALTIME_SUM t where t.type is not null and to_char(t.stat_hour,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#date#
and t.region_id in ($regionIds$)
group by t.type

select t.region_id,r.region_name,trunc(sum(t.in_tourists)/(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT')) as in_tourists from REGION_REALTIME_SUM t,region_cfg r where t.type is not null and r.ID=t.region_id and to_char(t.stat_hour,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#date#
and t.region_id in ($regionIds$)
group by t.region_id,r.region_name order by in_tourists desc

SELECT trunc(SUM(nvl(s.stay_tourists, 0)) /(SELECT VALUE FROM common WHERE NAME = 'CHINA_MOBILE_PERCENT')) touristcount,s.type FROM region_realtime_sum s, region_cfg t WHERE t.id = s.region_id
and s.region_id in ($regionIds$)
AND s.city_code = #cityId#
AND to_char(s.stat_hour, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH24')=#date# group by s.type

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (select t.* from REGION_ALARM_LOG t where 1=1
and t.SCENIC_CODE=#scenicCode#
and t.WARNING_LEVEL=#warningLevel#
and t.SCENIC_CODE in ($regionIds$)
and trunc(t.EDIT_TIME) >= to_date(#begTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD') and trunc(t.EDIT_TIME) <= to_date(#endTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #pageSize# ) WHERE RN >= #page#

select count(1) as count from REGION_ALARM_LOG t where 1=1
and t.SCENIC_CODE=#scenicCode#
and t.WARNING_LEVEL=#warningLevel#
and t.SCENIC_CODE in ($regionIds$)
and trunc(t.EDIT_TIME) >= to_date(#begTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD') and trunc(t.EDIT_TIME) <= to_date(#endTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
